ComicInfo.Summary: Men in Green: Bruce enlists Reed Richards and Tony Stark to create an exo-skeleton for the paralyzed Rick Jones. Henry Gyrich makes an offer to Bruce for the Hulk to become a government agent. An unknown malady affects Betty.
